SEARCH
Package com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.mapper

Class CardMapper

java.lang.Object
com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.mapper.CardMapper
public class CardMapper extends Object
Utility class for mapping between Card entities and CardDTO data transfer objects.

Provides static methods to convert domain entities to DTOs and vice versa, applying validation and format transformations during the process.

Author: Timothy Butler
Course: CEN 3024 - Software Development 1
Date: July 13, 2025

  • Field Details

    • logger

      private static final org.slf4j.Logger logger
      Logger instance for recording application events and errors in the DatabaseConnectionController.

      Uses SLF4J's LoggerFactory for standardized logging. Helps in debugging and tracing database connection handling.

  • Constructor Details

      private CardMapper()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation of this utility class.

  • Method Details

    • toEntity

      public static Card toEntity(CardDTO cardDTO)
      Converts a CardDTO into a Card entity.

      Performs field mapping, enum parsing for rarity, and string-to-date/decimal conversions. Throws IllegalArgumentException if any values are invalid or improperly formatted.

      Parameters:
      cardDTO - the DTO containing card data to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding Card entity
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input data is invalid

    • toDto

      public static CardDTO toDto(Card card)
      Converts a Card entity into a CardDTO object.

      Transforms all fields, including dates and BigDecimal, into string representations suitable for the frontend.

      Parameters:
      card - the Card entity to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding CardDTO
